meanings.sent1: I saw many backwashes in the sink.
meanings.sent2: The backwashes from the waves hit the shore gently.
meanings.sent3: The backwashes in the pool made funny patterns.
meanings.sent4: The backwashes of memories flooded her mind.
meanings.sent5: The backwashes of rainwater created a small puddle.

meanings.definition: The act of washing something in reverse, causing the water or liquid to flow backwards.
meanings.sent1: He used the backwashes to clean the dirt off the car.
meanings.sent2: The sudden backwashes surprised the fish in the tank.
meanings.sent3: The backwashes in the fountain made the water dance backwards.
meanings.sent4: The backwashes of the river carried the leaves upstream.
meanings.sent5: The backwashes of the dishwasher sprayed water everywhere.

meanings.definition: The residue left behind after liquid has been poured out of a container.
meanings.sent1: The backwashes in the glass were sticky.
meanings.sent2: She wiped away the backwashes from the spilled juice.
meanings.sent3: The backwashes on the table looked like a tiny lake.
meanings.sent4: The backwashes of the drink dried into a stain.
meanings.sent5: The backwashes of the paint formed a colorful ring.
